author: The Conversation
title: Our coronavirus symptom-tracking app has been used by millions — here’s what we’re learning
description: The global COVID-19 pandemic caused by the novel SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus is a public health emergency. In just under three months, we have gone from distant reports of a new disease emerging in China to seeing cities locked down and health services brought to …
